description:
If the idea of training in the cold has you looking forward to refreshing deep breaths of crisp air, then this top is worth a look. With its half-zip design, this long sleeve provides light coverage with easy ventilation. Whether you wear it as a mid-layer or as your outer layer, the midweight fleece will help keep you comfy while working up a sweat in cool weather.

  • Recycled polyester blend is light and dries quickly
  • Brushed interior holds in warmth while wicking away moisture
  • Flat locked seams reduce bulk and glide smoothly against your skin
  • OEKO-TEX 100 certified fabric adds confidence that what's next to your skin is made with the utmost care
  • Regular fit feels just like you want it to
name: B Daehlie Half Zip Grid - Men's
